sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function RecipesCards() { const [cards, setCards] = useState({}) const [id, setId] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { axios .get('http://localhost:3001/recipesPopular') .then(res => { console.log(res) setCards(res.data[0]) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) },[]) const sixTimes = () => { return id<6 ? setId(id + 1) : null; } sixTimes() return (
{/*
{cards[0].title}

recipe API

{cards[1].title}

recipe API

{cards[2].title}

recipe API

{cards[3].title}

recipe API

{cards[4].title}

recipe API

{cards[5].title}

recipe API

*/}
) } export default RecipesCards
